languages.text: "Вот ведь самоуверенные говнюки! Лорд-капитан, не поверите — враги Человечества хотят, нет, требуют подняться на борт и говорить! Только не с вами. А со своим нечестивым собратом, которого вы при себе держите. Как они вообще нас нашли?!"

traits.locale_text: "Вот ведь самоуверенные говнюки! Лорд-капитан, не поверите — враги Человечества хотят, нет, требуют подняться на борт и говорить! Только не с вами. А со своим нечестивым собратом, которого вы при себе держите. Как они вообще нас нашли?!"

languages.text: "Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"
languages.original_text: "Вот ведь самоуверенные говнюки! Лорд-капитан, не поверите — враги Человечества хотят, нет, требуют подняться на борт и говорить! Только не с вами. А со своим нечестивым собратом, которого вы при себе держите. Как они вообще нас нашли?!"

traits.locale_text: "Will you just look at these entitles pricks! Lord Captain, you are not going to believe this. The Enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They will be talking to their disgraced kinsman you have taken under wing. How did they even find us?!"

"Will you just look at these entitles pricks! Lord Captain, you are not going to believe this. The Enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They will be talking to their disgraced kinsman you have taken under wing. How did they even find us?!"

"Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

"Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

"Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

languages.text: "Nicht zu fassen, diese eingebildeten Mistkerle! Lord Cap'n, das werdet Ihr nicht glauben. Die Feinde der Menschheit bitten darum ... nein, sie verlangen, an Bord gelassen zu werden, für eine Unterredung! Aber nicht etwa mit Euch, nein. Sie wollen mit ihrem entehrten Verwandten sprechen, den Ihr unter Eure Fittiche genommen habt. Wie haben die uns überhaupt gefunden?"
languages.original_text: "Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht zu fassen, diese eingebildeten Mistkerle! Lord Cap'n, das werdet Ihr nicht glauben. Die Feinde der Menschheit bitten darum ... nein, sie verlangen, an Bord gelassen zu werden, für eine Unterredung! Aber nicht etwa mit Euch, nein. Sie wollen mit ihrem entehrten Verwandten sprechen, den Ihr unter Eure Fittiche genommen habt. Wie haben die uns überhaupt gefunden?"

languages.text: “你真该看看这群刺儿头有多不要脸，船长老大！说了你恐怕不信，但这群人类之敌居然请求——不，他们居然要求上船，这样他们才愿意谈谈！而且他们居然不是想和你谈谈，而是想和被你庇护的那个混蛋异形谈谈。这群异形到底是怎么找到我们的？”
languages.original_text: "Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

traits.locale_text: “你真该看看这群刺儿头有多不要脸，船长老大！说了你恐怕不信，但这群人类之敌居然请求——不，他们居然要求上船，这样他们才愿意谈谈！而且他们居然不是想和你谈谈，而是想和被你庇护的那个混蛋异形谈谈。这群异形到底是怎么找到我们的？”

languages.text: « Mais quelle bande de connards arrogants ! {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, vous n'allez pas en croire vos esgourdes. Les ennemis de l'humanité demandent... non, ils exigent d'être admis à bord pour discuter ! Mais pas avec vous. Ils veulent parler à leur congénère déchu, celui que vous avez pris sous votre aile. Comment nous ont-ils trouvés ? »
languages.original_text: "Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais quelle bande de connards arrogants ! {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, vous n'allez pas en croire vos esgourdes. Les ennemis de l'humanité demandent... non, ils exigent d'être admis à bord pour discuter ! Mais pas avec vous. Ils veulent parler à leur congénère déchu, celui que vous avez pris sous votre aile. Comment nous ont-ils trouvés ? »

languages.text: «¡Menudo hatajo de capullos creídos! Lord Capitán, no se lo va a creer. ¡Los enemigos de la Humanidad piden, no, exigen, que les dejemos subir a bordo para hablar! Y no con usted, no. Quieren hablar con su pariente caído en desgracia, al que ha acogido. ¿Se puede saber cómo nos han encontrado en primer lugar?».
languages.original_text: "Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Menudo hatajo de capullos creídos! Lord Capitán, no se lo va a creer. ¡Los enemigos de la Humanidad piden, no, exigen, que les dejemos subir a bordo para hablar! Y no con usted, no. Quieren hablar con su pariente caído en desgracia, al que ha acogido. ¿Se puede saber cómo nos han encontrado en primer lugar?».

languages.text: 「こんなふざけた奴らをただ見ているだけですか？まさか信じているわけではありませんよね？人類の敵は話をするために乗り込ませろと依頼して…いえ、要求しているんですよ。ですが、その相手は陛下ではありません。奴らは陛下が現在保護している恥さらしの同族と話をしたがっているのです。そもそも奴らはどうやって我々を見つけたのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

traits.locale_text: 「こんなふざけた奴らをただ見ているだけですか？まさか信じているわけではありませんよね？人類の敵は話をするために乗り込ませろと依頼して…いえ、要求しているんですよ。ですが、その相手は陛下ではありません。奴らは陛下が現在保護している恥さらしの同族と話をしたがっているのです。そもそも奴らはどうやって我々を見つけたのでしょう？」

languages.text: "Şu kendilerini beğenmiş hergelelere de bakın! Lord Kaptan, buna inanmayacaksınız. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının isteği, daha doğrusu talebi, konuşmak adına gemiye kabul edilmekmiş! Sizinle de değil üstelik. Kanatlarınız altına aldığınız yüz karası soydaşlarıyla konuşmak istiyorlarmış. Bizi nasıl buldular ki?"
languages.original_text: "Will you just look at these entitled pricks! Lord Cap'n, you're not going to believe this. The enemies of Humanity request — nay, they demand to be admitted aboard so they can have words! But not with you, no. They want to talk to their disgraced kinsman whom you've taken under your wing. How'd they even find us?"

traits.locale_text: "Şu kendilerini beğenmiş hergelelere de bakın! Lord Kaptan, buna inanmayacaksınız. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının isteği, daha doğrusu talebi, konuşmak adına gemiye kabul edilmeleriymiş! Sizinle değil ama, hayır. Kanatlarınız altına aldığınız yüz karası soydaşlarıyla konuşmak istiyorlarmış. Bizi nasıl buldular ki?"
